name: Addressaurus: The Address Finder
description: Addressaurus is a delightful and practical Firefox add-on that enhances your browsing experience. With a simple right-click, transform any selected address on a webpage into an immersive map exploration. By selecting an address and choosing 'Search on Map' from the context menu, Addressaurus opens a new tab with the selected map service, instantly displaying the selected location. Experience the joy of seamless navigation and embark on exciting map adventures.
